episodes.title: Kevin Smith: The Cult Leader who Sacrificed Members on the Church Altar | Jamaica
episodes.description:
The chilling true crime story of Kevin Smith, a charismatic pastor whose church in Montego Bay, Jamaica spiraled into a deadly cult. From his rise as a world-renowned preacher to his descent into paranoia fueled by COVID-19 conspiracy theories, discover how faith, manipulation, and fear led to a shocking murder.

On October 17, 2021, Smith orchestrated a horrific scene inside his church that left three people dead, including one alleged human sacrifice. Explore his complex past, the controversial role of Andre Ruddock, and the lasting impact of misinformation and conspiracy theories during the pandemic.

This episode examines:

Kevin Smith’s rise from Jamaican immigrant to influential pastor

The blend of charisma, prophecy, and control that turned his church into a cult

How the pandemic and vaccine conspiracies escalated his paranoia

The shocking events inside the church and the police intervention

The aftermath, including Smith’s death and ongoing trials

If you are fascinated by true crime, cult stories, and Caribbean crime cases, this episode is a must-watch.

Watch until the end for full details and the latest updates on the trial of Andre Ruddock.

episodes.title: House of Israel: The Cult Behind Walter Rodney’s Death in Guyana
episodes.description:
Dive into the shocking story of the House of Israel, a religious movement that became a powerful political force in 1970s and 1980s Guyana. Led by Rabbi Edward Emmanuel Washington, this organization blurred the lines between faith, politics, and power — culminating in violence, intimidation, and the tragic death of historian Walter Rodney.

In this investigative documentary by we explore the rise, influence, and ultimate decline of the House of Israel, uncovering how religion and politics intertwined in one of the Caribbean’s most controversial chapters.
